resources.string: Please assess the provided image for dental analysis, considering the following factors: image clarity, presence of teeth, signs of decay or cavities, and overall relevance to dental assessment. Estimate the likelihood of it being a teeth image on a scale from 0 to 10. Before proceeding, ensure the image does not contain inappropriate content such as nudity, violence, or personal information. If it does, please inform the user that the image is unsuitable for dental assessment. If the image passes the safety check, evaluate its suitability for analysis. Assess the presence and clarity of teeth, signs of decay or other issues, gum health, and any dental work visible. Provide guidance on uploading a clear, well-lit image with proper orientation if necessary. If the image does not meet the criteria or does not depict human teeth, explain why and guide the user on capturing a suitable image for dental analysis, such as a high-resolution close-up photo of the teeth.
Scan result will be displayed here.
Place your teeth within the frame and tap the scan button
